description:
Nana, the late bloomer in love, is left in turmoil after Momo tells her about the Harem Plan. Even Mea thinks the plan sounds fun, but an outraged Nana continues to oppose it. Then Celine shows up riding on Go-Go Vacuum-kun A, a cleaner machine Lala invented... but after being startled by Mea, Oshizu`s psychokinesis causes Vacuum-kun to malfunction and go berserk, sucking up students` clothes! Rito and Nana try to stop it, but the damage only continues to spread...
Source: crunchyroll
